alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 10:57PM MDT until July 03 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jones County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 1245 AM CDT/1145 PM MDT/. * At 1157 PM CDT/1057 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of 5 Mile Corner, or 11 miles northwest of Presho, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fate Dam around 1210 AM CDT. Cedar Creek Rec Area around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Byre Lake and Joe Creek Rec Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
